title: Enhancement of the texture and microstructure of faba bean-based meat analogues with brewers' spent grain through enzymatic treatments
content:
Sustainable Food Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4FB00045E, Paper

Yue Fan, Shiyu Zheng, Pratheep K. Annamalai, Bhesh Bhandari, Sangeeta Prakash
This study uses a low-energy enzymatic treatment to produce plant-based meat from faba bean protein and brewers' spent grain.
